page.title: 08SPORT CENTRE INTERVIEW.
page.content: {.1, HOW MANY PEOPLE WORK AT THE SPORT {CENTRE ? ONE FULL TIME CLEANER, TWO LADY PART TIME CLEANERS,MANAGER,THREE RECREATION OFFICERS.ON A SHIFT BASIS,FIVE RECEPTIONISTS AND FIFTEEN COACHES. {2, HOW MUCH MONEY DOES THE SPORT {CENTRE TAKE PER WEEK ? Â£3,500 (ROUGHLY) {3, WHAT FACILITIES DOES IT HAVE TO {OFFER ? SPORTS HALL,TWELVE FOOT BY SIXTY FOOT, FOUR SQUASH COURTS,WEIGHT TRAINING ROOM,TWO GYMNASIUM'S,FLOOD LIT AREA SIXTY BY FORTY,AND FIVE TENNIS COURTS. {4,HOW MANY MEMBERS HAS THE SPORT {CENTRE GOT ? THERE IS THE JUNIOR,FAMILY AND ADULT MEMBERSHIPS.414 UP TO DATE,BUT IT VARIES.
